name: Walk of Shame
description:
Waking up at a one-night stand place is expected to be an unbecoming affair, makes worse by the sudden appearance of their unbeknownst husband. How would you escape with your dignity intact?

Investigate the flat without getting caught and find the many ways you can escape!

FEATURES
  • 14 unique endings with 1 hidden ending
  • Cute pixel art
  • Achivements
